segments.text: I'm just watching this scene, and frankly, I'm quite irritated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can a person be so completely out of touch with their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clearly overflowing, creating a giant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically swimming in it, yet she just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's utterly absurd to witness such profound obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically performing an acrobat act behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly stealing cookies, and she hasn't got a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole house is going to be ruined by water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that poor boy is going to fall off that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me genuinely angry to see such a lack of awareness from an adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disgusting display of negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to snap her out of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
